programme.sub-title: Japanese Food Inspired By Other Cultures
programme.desc: Chef and culinary instructor Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen cooks Japanese cuisine inspired by other cultures with a pork and tofu dish, sesame chicken salad, breaded pork cutlet, and even a French crepe.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: It's all about the grill as Thai chef and cookbook author Pailin Changchitnant makes dish after dish to go on the BBQ, like grilled eggplant salad, steak with dipping sauce or in a salad, and fish in banana leaves.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Award-winning chef Natalia Machado from Argentina makes palm heart and shrimp salad, beef stew in a pumpkin, roasted pork spare ribs with a delicious marinade, and addictive dulce de leche ice cream.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini delves into the Italian region of Emilia-Romagna to discover its iconic cuisine; he stays light with an airy mortadella mousse spread on fluffy flatbreads; cooking up tortellini in broth.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini explores sweet and spicy dishes hailing from the coastal region of Calabria; for his antipasto, he cooks up a light and refreshing brioche with gelato; a spicy sausage and ricotta pasta.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Full of luxurious treats, the northern Italian region of Lombardy offers rich and delicious cuisine; for his antipasto, chef Michael Bonacini prepares a delicate dish of stuffed squash blossoms.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Known for its lush landscape, Umbria is a region of that offers fresh, seasonal ingredients perfect for simple-yet-boldly flavored cuisine; chef Michael Bonacini serves up a sweet and spicy antipasto of fried spicy tomato flatbread.

programme.desc: Chef and cookbook author Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen makes traditional Japanese foods like tofu rice pockets, miso glazes, and rice flour dumplings.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Red curry is the star attraction in a stellar line-up of dishes Thai chef Pailin Chongchitnant makes, starting at red curry paste, and making her way to fish custard, chicken stir fry, and red curry duck.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Eggs are the linking ingredient between green beans ranch-style, zucchini quiche, stuffed beef flank, and vanilla custard with dulce de leche, all prepared by award-winning Argentinian chef Natalia Machado.
